Orders∵

An Order resource is a construct that logically groups related transaction operations for a particular seller (Customer). An Order allows issuing payouts to one Customer and the marketplace bank account.


Available Query Filters
created_at

Available Operations: =, !=, <, <=, >, >=

Default Operation: =

Sortable: True

Create an Order∵

Create a new Order.

delivery_address
optional object. A single-level dictionary of string-type key/value pairs representing the address of the person or business.
description
optional string. Free-text description of the order for the dashboard.
meta
optional object. Single level mapping from string keys to string values.

Definition

POST https://api.balancedpayments.com/customers/:customer_id/orders

Balanced::Customer.create_order

balanced.Order()

balanced.customer.orders.create()

Customer().createOrder(Map<String, Object> payload)

Balanced\Customer->orders->create()

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/customers/CU5763NnQG26UvqOxKsorsiQ/orders \
     -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
     -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL: \
     -d "description=Order #12341234"

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

merchant_customer = Balanced::Customer.fetch('/customers/CU7HlonBKQXhBkwRJdO2kZen')
merchant_customer.create_order(
  :description => 'Order #12341234'
)

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

merchant_customer = balanced.Customer.fetch('/customers/CU64R7DS6DwuXYVg9RTskFK8')
merchant_customer.create_order(
  description='Order #12341234'
).save()

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.get('/customers/CU5763NnQG26UvqOxKsorsiQ').orders.create({
    "description": "Order #12341234"
})

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

Customer customer = new Customer("/customers/CU4EeI9UPzRcOo2C3j1qFjQj");

Map<String, Object> payload = new HashMap<String, Object>();
payload.put("description", "Order #12341234");

try {
    customer.createOrder(payload);
}
catch (HTTPError e) {}

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

$merchant = Balanced\Customer::get("/customers/CU3veCwC1nqk9GV6dfSkRHRS");
$order = $merchant->orders->create();

?>

Example Response

{
    "links": {
        "orders.buyers": "/orders/{orders.id}/buyers", 
        "orders.credits": "/orders/{orders.id}/credits", 
        "orders.debits": "/orders/{orders.id}/debits", 
        "orders.merchant": "/customers/{orders.merchant}", 
        "orders.refunds": "/orders/{orders.id}/refunds", 
        "orders.reversals": "/orders/{orders.id}/reversals"
    }, 
    "orders": [
        {
            "amount": 0, 
            "amount_escrowed": 0, 
            "created_at": "2014-03-27T16:13:10.704261Z", 
            "currency": "USD", 
            "delivery_address": {
                "city": null, 
                "country_code": null, 
                "line1": null, 
                "line2": null, 
                "postal_code": null, 
                "state": null
            }, 
            "description": "Order #12341234", 
            "href": "/orders/OR5nN8ArUWvXnwIG1yQksbtm", 
            "id": "OR5nN8ArUWvXnwIG1yQksbtm", 
            "links": {
                "merchant": "CU5763NnQG26UvqOxKsorsiQ"
            }, 
            "meta": {}, 
            "updated_at": "2014-03-27T16:13:10.704265Z"
        }
    ]
}

Fetch an Order∵

Fetch the details of a previously created order.

Definition

GET https://api.balancedpayments.com/orders/:order_id

Balanced::Order.fetch

balanced.Order.fetch()

balanced.get()

Order(String uri)

Balanced\Order::get()

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/orders/OR5nN8ArUWvXnwIG1yQksbtm \
     -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
     -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL:

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

order = Balanced::Order.fetch('/orders/ORb1Pk4q78R971l2LFiZwhM')

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

order = balanced.Order.fetch('/orders/OR6wcEVkOymvs4PairiGEcIx')

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.get('/orders/OR5nN8ArUWvXnwIG1yQksbtm')

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

Order order = new Order("/orders/OR520nGy59wfJ4mM7HR6TYrn");

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

Balanced\Order::get("/orders/OR3Ol0FhtkLKUwZvw3D2frmO");

?>

            "id": "OR5nN8ArUWvXnwIG1yQksbtm",

List All Orders∵

List all previously created orders.

limit
optional integer. Defaults to 10.
offset
optional integer. Defaults to 0.

Definition

GET https://api.balancedpayments.com/orders

Balanced::Order.all

balanced.Order.query

balanced.marketplace.orders

Order.Collection(String uri)

Balanced\Marketplace::mine()->orders

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/orders \
      -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
      -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL:

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

orders = Balanced::Order.all

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

orders = balanced.Order.query

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.marketplace.orders

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

Order.Collection orders = new Order.Collection(Order.resource_href);

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

$marketplace = Balanced\Marketplace::mine();
$orders = $marketplace->orders->query()->all();

?>

Example Response

{
    "links": {
        "orders.buyers": "/orders/{orders.id}/buyers",

        "orders.refunds": "/orders/{orders.id}/refunds",

        "first": "/orders?limit=10&offset=0", 
        "href": "/orders?limit=10&offset=0", 
        "last": "/orders?limit=10&offset=0", 
        "limit": 10,

        "previous": null,

    }, 
    "orders": [
        {
            "amount": 0,

        }
    ]
}

Update an Order∵

Update a previously created order.

description
optional string. Free-text description of the order for the dashboard.
meta
optional object. Single level mapping from string keys to string values.

Definition

PUT https://api.balancedpayments.com/orders/:order_id

Balanced::Order.save

balanced.Order().save()

balanced.get().save()

Order().save()

Balanced\Order->save()

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/orders/OR5nN8ArUWvXnwIG1yQksbtm \
     -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
     -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL: \
     -X PUT \
     -d "description=New description for order" \
     -d "meta[product.id]=1234567890" \
     -d "meta[anykey]=valuegoeshere"

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

order = Balanced::Order.fetch('/orders/ORb1Pk4q78R971l2LFiZwhM')
order.description = 'New description for order'
order.meta = {
    'anykey' => 'valuegoeshere',
    'product.id' => '1234567890'
}
order.save

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

order = balanced.Order.fetch('/orders/OR6wcEVkOymvs4PairiGEcIx')
order.description = 'New description for order'
order.meta = {
  'anykey': 'valuegoeshere',
  'product.id': '1234567890'
}
order.save()

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.get('/orders/OR5nN8ArUWvXnwIG1yQksbtm')
    .set('meta.product_id', '123123123')
    .save()

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

Order order = new Order("/orders/OR520nGy59wfJ4mM7HR6TYrn");

Map<String, String> meta = new HashMap<String, String>();
meta.put("product.id", "1234567890");
meta.put("anykey", "valuegoeshere");

order.meta = meta;
order.description = "New description for order";

try {
    order.save();
}
catch (HTTPError e) {}

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

$order = Balanced\Order::get("/orders/OR3Ol0FhtkLKUwZvw3D2frmO");
$order->description = 'New description for order';
$order->meta = array(
    "anykey" => "valuegoeshere",
    "product.id" => "1234567890",
);
$order->save();

?>

Example Response

{
    "links": {
        "orders.buyers": "/orders/{orders.id}/buyers", 
        "orders.credits": "/orders/{orders.id}/credits", 
        "orders.debits": "/orders/{orders.id}/debits", 
        "orders.merchant": "/customers/{orders.merchant}", 
        "orders.refunds": "/orders/{orders.id}/refunds", 
        "orders.reversals": "/orders/{orders.id}/reversals"
    }, 
    "orders": [
        {
            "amount": 0, 
            "amount_escrowed": 0, 
            "created_at": "2014-03-27T16:13:10.704261Z", 
            "currency": "USD", 
            "delivery_address": {
                "city": null, 
                "country_code": null, 
                "line1": null, 
                "line2": null, 
                "postal_code": null, 
                "state": null
            }, 
            "description": "New description for order", 
            "href": "/orders/OR5nN8ArUWvXnwIG1yQksbtm", 
            "id": "OR5nN8ArUWvXnwIG1yQksbtm", 
            "links": {
                "merchant": "CU5763NnQG26UvqOxKsorsiQ"
            }, 
            "meta": {
                "anykey": "valuegoeshere", 
                "product.id": "1234567890"
            }, 
            "updated_at": "2014-03-27T16:13:14.418422Z"
        }
    ]
}
